Bases: autodrive._view.CellFormatting

add_alternating_row_background(colors: autodrive.interfaces.Color) → autodrive.formatting.format_rng.RangeCellFormatting¶

Queues a request to add an alternating row background of the indicated color to this Range’s cells.

Parameters

colors (Color) – The desired Color to apply to every other row.

Returns

This formatting object, so further requests can be queued if desired.

Return type

autodrive.formatting.format_tab module¶

class autodrive.formatting.format_tab.TabCellFormatting(parent: autodrive._view.Component[Any, Any, Any])¶

Bases: autodrive._view.CellFormatting

add_alternating_row_background(colors: Color, rng: TwoDRange | None = None) → TabCellFormatting¶

Queues a request to add an alternating row background of the indicated color to this Tab’s cells, or to a range within the Tab.

Parameters

  • colors (Color) – The desired Color to apply to every other row.

  • rng – A TwoDRange within the tab to apply the alternating row colors to.

Type

rng: TwoDRange, optional

Returns

This formatting object, so further requests can be queued if desired.

Return type

TabCellFormatting

Bases: autodrive._view.GridFormatting

append_rows(num_rows: int) → autodrive.formatting.format_tab.TabGridFormatting¶

Queues a request to add new empty rows at the bottom of the Tab.

Parameters

num_rows (int) – The number of rows to add to the bottom of the Tab.

Returns

This formatting object, so further requests can be queued if desired.

Return type

TabGridFormatting

auto_column_width(rng: OneDRange | None = None) → TabGridFormatting¶

Queues a request to set the column width of the Tab’s columns equal to the width of the values in the cells.

Parameters

rng (OneDRange, optional) – The range of columns to be affected, defaults to None for all columns in the Tab.

Returns

This formatting object, so further requests can be queued if desired.

Return type

TabGridFormatting

delete_rows(rng: autodrive.interfaces.OneDRange) → autodrive.formatting.format_tab.TabGridFormatting¶

Queues a request to delete rows in the selected row range.

Parameters

rng (OneDRange) – The range of rows to delete.

Returns

This formatting object, so further requests can be queued if desired.

Return type

TabGridFormatting

insert_rows(num_rows: int, at_row: int) → autodrive.formatting.format_tab.TabGridFormatting¶

Queues a request to insert new empty rows at the specified row number.

Parameters

  • num_rows (int) – The number of rows to insert.

  • at_row (int) – The row number to insert after.

Returns

This formatting object, so further requests can be queued if desired.

Return type

TabGridFormatting

class autodrive.formatting.format_tab.TabTextFormatting(parent: autodrive._view.Component[Any, Any, Any])¶

Bases: autodrive._view.TextFormatting

apply_format(format: Format, rng: TwoDRange | None = None) → TabTextFormatting¶

Queues a request to set the text/number format of the Range’s cells.

Parameters

  • format (_Format) – A format instance, such as TextFormat or NumberFormat.

  • rng (TwoDRange, optional) – Optional rnage within the Tab to apply the format to, defaults to None, for all cells in the Tab.

Returns

This formatting object, so further requests can be queued if desired.

Return type

TabTextFormatting
